attributes.action: 0845 nos  are unfair tax on the poor for claiming benifits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is wholly unfair that you are now putting in 0845 no for claimants to make a claim  for benefits for people who are unable to attend the Job centre  to make claims over the phone  I feel the Government is  now taking back  what little that you are giving us back in a different way in terms of call charges I fell that it is totally unjust and unfair that claimants now have to pay the Government to make a claim for benefits I understand that there needs to be changes how ever at the claimants cost is unfair it’s a another form of taxation on the poor and disabled you need to reconsider this.
